org.openscience.cdk.interfaces

Interface IAminoAcid

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, IAtomContainer, ICDKObject, IChemObject, IChemObjectListener, IMonomer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AminoAcid, DebugAminoAcid, NNAminoAcid

    public interface IAminoAcid
extends IMonomer
    A AminoAcid is Monomer which stores additional amino acid specific informations, like the N-terminus atom.
    Author:
    Egon Willighagen
    Keywords:
    amino acid
    Created on:
    2005-12-05
    Belongs to CDK module:
    interfaces
    Source code:
    HEAD
